definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Do you remember what i wrote on the slate ?
sentences.chinese: 你還記得我在寫字板上寫的字嗎？

sentences.english: The glass holder which can be rotatablely overlapped is arranged in the front end of the tablet.
sentences.chinese: 在寫字板的前端，設有可轉疊的杯架。

sentences.english: This is the control upon which WordPad application is built.
sentences.chinese: 這是賴以寫字板應用程序生成的控制。

sentences.english: I take out a clipboard, write 1 "and how many more than 4?"
sentences.chinese: 我拿出寫字板，在上面寫了一句“8比4多多少？”

sentences.english: Once WordPad is open, type a string of text into it.
sentences.chinese: 打開“寫字板”後，在其中鍵入一個文本字符串。

sentences.english: Some of tablets appear to be Lexical Lists, written in two or three columns.
sentences.chinese: 其中一些寫字板出現了詞彙列表，分兩至三列寫成。
